body.content.p: Strike back: Watch video of South Sudan’s ‘Arrow Boys’ protecting their village
War Tours: See a gallery of photographs from Afghanistan’s surprising, burgeoning tourism industry
On The Jobs: Watch Chris Sorensen talk more about Canada’s skilled-worker shortage and why it may be the biggest threat facing the economy
Doll Frenzy: See more photos of the Waldorf dolls that are being snapped up online for hundreds of dollars
Mea culpa: Listen in on our talk with Mark Lynas as he discusses his decision to abandon the anti-GM cause he founded

For full coverage of the election of the new pope, see our iPad edition, where Senior Writer Brian Bethune is reporting from Rome on the conclave—the contenders, the politics and the future of the Catholic Church
